name: David Ramirez
text: I like the MCU Spidey more than the comics Spidey.     It's been decades since I've read the comics, but from what I remember, he was just unreasonably miserable and isolated. I'm glad MCU Spidey seems more balanced, and has a better support system.    Also, I feel that MCU MJ is so much better than the comics MJ, who seemed to me to be a generic warm-hearted hot chick. In these movies, she's quirky and more real and her own person. Though I bet quite a lot of white fanboys are still complaining she's not a curvy redhead.
